product_name: Showers Pass Rogue Bike Pants - Men's
long_description: The men's Rogue Bike Pants from Showers Pass deliver great stretch and reflectivity for your ride and smart-looking style for your destination, be it work or play. Nylon/spandex fabric offers easygoing, 4-way stretch and features a durable water repellent finish. Waistband utility loop holds a U-lock. Showers Pass Rogue Bike Pants have reflective trim; roll-up cuffs show additional reflectivity as well as a cinch strap. Crotch gusset aids mobility. Jeans-style hand pockets and 2 rear pockets, 1 of which is zippered.
short_description: The men's Rogue Bike Pants from Showers Pass deliver great stretch and reflectivity for your ride and smart-looking style for your destination, be it work or play.
